name: Tips for Maximizing Big-City Living
summary: Living in a big city certainly has its perks—
short_description: Living in a big city certainly has its perks—walking distance to restaurants and shops, living close to where you work,  and being able to rub elbows with your neighbors—just to name a few. But with the high costs of rent in thriving cities, some people may find themselves living in close quarters and it’s important to find ways to maximize those small living spaces. Less is often more, and may be the only option, but having little space doesn’t mean sacrificing function and style. There are several creative products on the market today that cater to small apartment dwellers...
